classification_criteria.used_dynamically: Mentioned in config files, subprocess calls, __main__ blocks, or CLI tools.
classification_criteria.agent_entrypoints: Top-level agent modules likely triggered by TaskNexus, mailbox inbox, or CLI tools.
classification_criteria.test_utilities: Support code used in tests, but not imported elsewhere.
classification_criteria.deprecated_or_old_versions: Obvious from name (e.g. legacy, v1, backup, unused, archive).
classification_criteria.migration_pending: Files mentioned in TODOs, logs, or swarm agent notes to be refactored or moved.
classification_criteria.config_only: Files used solely as configs (static data, schemas, coordination patterns).
classification_criteria.plugin_modules: Files intended for runtime plugin discovery (tool registry, capability loader).
classification_criteria.tool_scripts: Standalone `.py` tools under `/tools`, CLI calls, diagnostics, or calibration scripts.
classification_criteria.dashboard_or_gui: Dash or Qt UI code (dashboard_ui, main_window, etc).
classification_criteria.truly_orphaned: No imports, no dynamic reference, not called anywhere else.
